author: jonl
msg: Reduced lock contention in loadMarkup by not holding lock during markup parsing

author: jonl
msg: Minor refactoring in Application and ApplicationSettings.  Changed
Application.sourcePath property to resourcePath since that's what it
really is.  Changed getCrypt() and getMarkupParser() to newCrypt()
and newMarkupParser() since these are really factory methods and they
should indicate that.  Made a bunch of methods final that should be
and reformatted some stuff.  Would like to make getSettings() final
too so that hotspot will inline accesses quickly.  Unfortunately, some Spring
related subclass has already overridden the method and so now we cannot

author: jonl
msg: Fixed synchronization problem and folded exception handling into loadMarkup method, shrinking the overall code.
